commit.message:
2004-05-27  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* javax/swing/JPopupMenu.java
	(isVisible): Do not use visible directly.
	(setVisible): Likewise.
	* javax/swing/JWindow.java
	(JWindow): call accessible constructor.
	* javax/swing/RepaintManager.java
	(paintDirtyRegions): Use public methods to obtain iterator.

From-SVN: r82319

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,13 @@
+2004-05-27  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>
+
+	* javax/swing/JPopupMenu.java
+	(isVisible): Do not use visible directly.
+	(setVisible): Likewise.
+	* javax/swing/JWindow.java
+	(JWindow): call accessible constructor.
+	* javax/swing/RepaintManager.java
+	(paintDirtyRegions): Use public methods to obtain iterator.
+
 2004-05-25  David Jee  <djee@redhat.com>
 
 	* java/awt/Container.java

@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@
  * DOCUMENT ME!
  *
  * @author $author$
- * @version $Revision: 1.3.8.3 $
+ * @version $Revision: 1.4 $
  */
 public class JPopupMenu extends JComponent implements Accessible, MenuElement
 {
@@ -471,7 +471,7 @@ public void pack()
    */
   public boolean isVisible()
   {
-    return super.visible;
+    return super.isVisible();
   }
 
   /**
@@ -481,7 +481,7 @@ public boolean isVisible()
    */
   public void setVisible(boolean visible)
   {
-    super.visible = visible;
+    super.setVisible(visible);
 
     firePopupMenuWillBecomeVisible();
